name: @architect/parser
description: Architect Parser accepts plaintext, JSON, or YAML .arc manifests and returns a plain JavaScript Object

scripts.deno:fmt: deno fmt mod.ts && deno fmt mod.test.ts
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.vendor:js-yaml: mkdir -p tmp && browserify --node --standalone js-yaml --im --no-builtins node_modules/js-yaml/index.js > tmp/js-yaml.js && terser tmp/js-yaml.js -o src/compat/vendor/js-yaml.min.js
scripts.vendor:toml: mkdir -p tmp && browserify --node --standalone toml --im --no-builtins node_modules/toml/index.js > tmp/toml.js && terser tmp/toml.js -o src/compat/vendor/toml.min.js
scripts.vendor: npm run vendor:js-yaml && npm run vendor:toml

author: Brian LeRoux
